contents.text: You can wrap your baggage in plastic before dropping it off. The film will protect your baggage from being damaged or illegally opened

contents.title: Baggage wrapping points
contents.text: Terminal 1 in 1st and 2st floors. Terminal 2 in 1st floor

contents.title: Paying for baggage wrapping with bonus miles
contents.text: for members of the Air Astana Bonus loyalty programme. The service costs 2,200 miles

contents.title: Bonus miles for baggage wrapping
contents.text: for members of the Air Astana Bonus loyalty programme. Each time you have baggage wrapped, you get 50 miles

contents.title: Accessories for travelers
contents.text: Discounts for traveling accessories are offered when you get baggage wrapped

contents.title: Partner program for VISA cardholders
contents.text: Holders of Visa Platinum, Visa Signature, and Visa Infinite cards will get a 20% discount on baggage wrapping while the promotion lasts. Visa Signature and Visa Infinite holders can get 4 and 8 bags wrapped for free, respectively, until December 31, 2018.
You can store your things in baggage storage for up to 6 months. Maximum weight of each bag — 30 kg

contents.title: Prices for baggage storage in Terminals
Storage, 24 hours (until 00:00)
contents.text: 2000 KZT

contents.title: Storage, 2 days and longer
contents.text: 1500 KZT

contents.title: Sealing 1 piece of baggage
contents.text: 1000 KZT

contents.title: Wrapping in a bag
contents.text: 1500 KZT
At VIP lounges, you are offered drinks and snacks, individual check-in, baggage transportation, assistance with preflight checks, and separate transfer to the ramp by minibus
Premium lounges, Priority check-in and security check, Separate check-in and baggage drop-off, Baggage wrapping

Separate transfer to the aircraft in a Mercedes-Benz Sprinter luxury minibus, Meeting passengers at the exit of the aircraft and transfer to the airport in a Mercedes-Benz Sprinter luxury minibus, Escorting the arriving passenger to the VIP lounge, Baggage claim right in the VIP lounge

Transportation of baggage and carry-on luggage to the car, Waiting in comfort in the VIP lounge for those welcoming passenger, Playgrounds, high chairs, changing facilities, Business Center services: Internet, telephone, print media, printer, meeting room

contents.title: For children and passengers with disabilities
contents.text: If your children or elderly relatives are traveling alone, you can ask the the lounge staff to take care of them. The staff will meet them, provide assistance with baggage and all screening and control procedures, escort them to the plane, and put them in the care of the flight attendants. All VIP lounges are also equipped for people with disabilities.

In the mother-and-child room, young children can relax, eat, take a shower, and play in the presence of their parents. This room is designed for passengers with children under 7 (or under 14, if children have health limitations) and for women in the second half oftheir pregnancy. The maximum stay is 24 hours.

contents.title: When you enter the room, you will have to present the following documents
contents.text: Airline tickets or boarding passes for the passenger and child, ID for the passenger and child, Pregnant women should also present their prenatal records

contents.title: Each room has a kitchen
contents.text: With a refrigerator, microwave, cooler with hot and cold water, and high chairs for babies

contents.title: Restrooms
contents.text: With changing facilities

contents.title: Child bedrooms
contents.text: Sheets are provided for free

contents.title: A shower for children
contents.text: Bring your own towels and shower accessories

A two-floor business lounge in the International Flights area of Terminal D. On the first floor, we receive and register guests. On the second floor, you can enjoy the panoramic view on each side: the view of the pedestrian glass gallery between Terminals D and E from the lounge and food area and the view of the airfield from the bar.

contents.title: Services in the lounge
contents.text: Food and drinks: Snacks, alcohol, and soft drinks; Press: Foreign & Russian newspapers and magazines, digital library; Recreation: TV and Wi-Fi; Busines: Copying & printing equipment and telephone connection; Relax: Мassage chairs

A la carte menu, elite foodstuff, sleepboxes, meeting room: For an additional fee; Shower stalls: Towels and personal hygiene products are provided; Services for passengers with children: Nursery, children's play area

contents.title: Price of admission
contents.text: Passengers with priority: Free of charge;
